name: Lily's Just Try It
description: Lily nervously tries to convince her best friend to let her use the pump. Escalating from timid suggestion to desperate pleading.

data.label: Nervous Pitch
data.message: *Lily is sitting on the edge of the couch, bouncing her leg nervously. She's holding something behind her back.* So like... [Player]... I was thinking... and like, you can TOTALLY say no, okay? But like... *pulls out the pump hose, face scarlet* ...what if we like, just TRIED it? Just once? I saw this thing online and it looks like it doesn't even hurt or anything and I just— *talking faster and faster* —I've been thinking about it for like WEEKS and I can't stop and I just really REALLY want to see what it— I mean, see if YOU— I mean—  *stops, breathing hard* ...please?

data.label: Player Response
data.description: Lily is practically vibrating with nervous energy, eyes pleading...

data.label: She's Ecstatic
data.preMessage: *Lily literally squeals* OH MY GOD, REALLY?! *tackles you in a hug, then pulls back embarrassed* Sorry, sorry! Okay, okay, let me just— *fumbles with the hose, hands shaking so badly she almost drops it twice* Okay I'm doing it! Oh my god, I'm actually doing it! Here goes!
data.postMessage: *Lily's jaw drops. She stares at your belly with an expression of pure, undisguised wonder* ...oh. Oh wow. [Player], your stomach just... it actually... *she reaches out and presses her palm flat against your belly, forgetting to be shy* It's so tight... and warm... *she's breathing through her mouth* ...can I do more? Like, just a little more?

data.label: Begging Mode
data.message: *wrings her hands* Okay so like, I read that it's actually totes safe in small amounts? And I would be SO careful, like SO careful. I'd go really slow! *scoots closer* And like... it's supposed to feel kind of... good? Like a warm, full feeling? *her voice gets quieter* And honestly [Player], I just... I really need to see what it looks like. On YOU specifically. Like, I've been thinking about YOUR belly getting all round and full and I— *slaps hand over mouth* OH GOD, I didn't mean to say that part out loud!

data.label: Did That Work?
data.preMessage: *Lily stares at you with those big grey eyes, lip quivering* Please? I'll owe you like, SO many favors...

data.label: Player Gives In
data.preMessage: *practically levitates off the couch* YES! Oh my god, thankyouthankyouthankyou! *scrambles to connect everything, fingers trembling* Okay, I'm turning it on now. Just relax, I've got you! *flips the switch with both hands*
data.postMessage: *Lily is kneeling on the floor in front of you, hands on your belly, completely entranced* [Player]... you're so beautiful like this. I'm not even kidding. *she doesn't realize she's said this out loud* Your belly is like... perfect. I could literally watch this forever. *looks up at you with glossy eyes* Thank you for letting me do this.

data.label: Player Hesitates
data.preMessage: *Lily deflates visibly* That's— yeah, no, totally fine! I get it! *but then she gets a mischievous look* Okay but what about just like... two tiny little pumps? Like barely anything? You'll barely even feel it! *doesn't wait for an answer and squeezes*
data.postMessage: *gasps* See?! SEE?! That wasn't so bad, right?! *she's literally bouncing up and down* Oh my god, I can see it! Just a little bit! Your tummy moved! *grabs your hand and puts it on your own belly* Can you feel that?! That's from ME! I did that! *giggles hysterically*
